doc.title: 37/78: Tree Again
doc.plot: At the centre are takes which do not change - a tree in a field in Vermont, U.S.A. Since the film was shot over a period of fifty days, the single frame shots create a storm of pictures. (Hans Scheugl)

At the centre are takes which do not change - a tree in a field in Vermont, U.S.A. Since the film was shot over a period of fifty days, the single frame shots create a storm of pictures. (Hans Scheugl)
